channel.title: Posts on Pacio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pacio

item.title: Marcell Nimfuehr joins Pacio as CMO
item.description: Marcell Nimfuehr has joined Pacio as CMO (Chief Marketing Officer), effective immediately. Like Fransisca earlier in April, Marcell is a significant addition to the Pacio team.

item.title: Francisca Vaessen
item.description: I am delighted to announce that Francisca has joined Pacio as our Internationalisation Coordinator. Fransisca is an international person, with European and African heritage, who lives and was educated in Holland, which has long been a country of internationalists.

item.title: Pacio White Paper
item.description: The consultation and rethinking following the Pacio Seed Presale in 2017 has resulted in an ambitious, better defined project. The White Paper and associated papers describing it are available at Pacio Papers.

item.title: Pacio Seed Presale Fully Subscribed
item.description: On 27 December 2017 the Pacio Seed Presale became fully subscribed, thanks to the contributor mentioned in Pacio Seed Presale Update taking up the balance, with this quote:

item.title: Pacio Seed Presale Update
item.description: On 26 November a person interested in Pacio approached us about buying Seed Presale PIOE tokens even though he had missed the Presale, which closed on 15 November 2017.

item.title: Update After the Pacio Seed Presale
item.description: The Pacio Seed Presale was closed on 15 November 2017 when 26.2% subscribed. The reasons for the disappointing result are clear:
